title: Pope chides Europe, comforts migrants on return to Lesbos
content:
1. Pope chides Europe, comforts migrants on return to Lesbos  Associated Press
  2. Pope Francis, visiting Greek razor wire-fenced migrant camp, challenges Europe to live up to its human rights ideals  The Washington Post
  3. Pope Francis warns of 'retreat from democracy' during Greece visit  New York Post
  4. Orthodox priest shouts 'Pope, you are a heretic' at Francis in Athens  Reuters
  5. Pope Francis decries 'shipwreck of civilization' as he visits refugees on Greek island of Lesbos  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 教皇はレスボス島に戻る際に、ヨーロッパを非難し、移民たちを慰めました。
